text:
an argument for minor ticks: as an economist I show a lot of time series where the year is on the x-axis. Here it removes clutter if you don’t have tick labels everywhere, but only say every 10 years. Minor ticks at say 5 years still help reading the plot.

So I’d say if the ticks are multiples of powers of 10, we figure out quite naturally what the minor ticks are without showing their value.
